snippet: Grove Atlantic, an independent publisher, has agreed to pay a six-figure advance for “Straight to Hell: True Tales of Deviance and Excess in the World of Investment Banking” by John LeFevre.
abstract: Wall Street parodist John LeFevre finds new publisher in Grove/Atlantic only two weeks after being dumped by Simon & Schuster; Grove will publish Straight to Hell: True Tales of Deviance and Excess in the World of Investment Banking, which draws on Twitter account supposedly based on conversations overheard in Goldman Sachs elevators.
lead_paragraph: Grove Atlantic, an independent publisher, has agreed to pay a six-figure advance for “Straight to Hell: True Tales of Deviance and Excess in the World of Investment Banking” by John LeFevre.

headline.main: Parodist of Goldman Finds a New Publisher
